entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why don't Memory/ReadOnlyMemory have indexers? #105286
  • MemoryTests.AllocateLargeHeapThenRepeatedlyInterop timing out #105283
    9.0.0
  • Update EH frame generation in llvm to work with functions specialization #105281
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IEnumerator<T> on ref struct enumerators #105276
    10.0.0
  • Native AOT doesn't include new core lib APIs provided by NuGet packages #105274
  • Backport use of GetInterceptableLocation to .NET 8.0 #105269
    8.0.x
  • Hang in FileShareOpen_Inheritable #105265
    9.0.0
  • Convert.FromBase64XYZ(...) decoder should reject input when unused bits are not set to 0 #105264
    10.0.0
  • QuicStream has racy ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore usage #105263
  • Merge more stores/loads #105257
    Future
  • Some hwintrinsic related antigen failures #105255
    9.0.0
  • EnsureInitialized test crash on llvm19/tvos #105251
  • System.Formats.Asn1 8.0.1 - The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference #105248
  • [mono][swift] App crashes in AOT + interpreter setup as it cannot find `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Swift` types #105245
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Generalize "downwards loop transformation" into linear function test replacement #105242
    10.0.0
  • JIT: support strength reducing multiple IVs with different step values provided they have a gcd > 1 #105241
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #105229
  • Test failure: GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #105211

Closed

  • OpenTelemetry SDK usage in C# Library project is giving System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.dll not found error #93421
    Future
  • Debugger assert - `Assert failure(PID 28244 [0x00006e54], Thread: 11360 [0x2c60]): pProcess->ThreadHoldsProcessLock()` #105261
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel service method collection return types #104617
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed: The class hierarchy should declare the method #103268
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: arrayBaseRef->GetArrayElementType() == ELEMENT_TYPE_OBJECT #105279
    9.0.0
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.DefaultMetricsFactoryTests.MeterDisposeTest` timing out in CI #105189
    9.0.0
  • TarReader unable to parse header attribute number of archive generated in iOS #103734
    Future
  • ChaCha20Poly1305.IsSupported always returns false on non-Windows #52482
    9.0.0
  • Support AES-GCM for iOS-like platforms #91523
    9.0.0
  • Irregular tag name of version v9.0.0-preview.6.24327.7 #104784
    9.0.0
  • Configuration Binding Generator Initializes Suffixed Default Values Incorrectly #92773
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Policy.Evidence missing in .NET Platform Extensions for .net framework #99447
    9.0.0
  • Support customizing enum member names in System.Text.Json #74385
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Intrinsics/BinaryPrimitivesReverseEndianness_r/BinaryPrimitivesReverseEndianness_r.cmd #105221
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b441487/b441487/b441487.cmd #105215
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/refany/format_r/format_r.dll #105227
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/v4.0/640474/test640474/test640474.cmd #105216
  • Test failure: JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/BenchmarksGame/regex-redux/regex-redux-1/regex-redux-1.dll #105214
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/ComWrappers/API/ComWrappersTests/ComWrappersTests.cmd #105210
  • Test failure: _Vector128_1_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector128_1.Program.op_UnaryPlusInt32() #105226
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler\\assembly\\ALCTest\\ALCTest.cmd #105225
  • Test failure: JIT/Intrinsics/TypeIntrinsics_ro/TypeIntrinsics_ro.cmd #105224
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: _AdvSimd_Arm64_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm._AdvSimd.Arm64.Program.StoreSelectedScalar_Vector128x3_Double() #105223
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/TypeInitialization/Inlining/GenMethInlined/GenMethInlined.cmd #105222
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b309539/b309539/b309539.dll #105220
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: _AdvSimd_Arm64_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm._AdvSimd.Arm64.Program.AbsSaturateScalar_Vector64_Int32() #105219
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09/b15155/b15155/b15155.dll #105218
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: GC\\API\\WeakReference\\multipleWRs_1\\multipleWRs_1.cmd #105213
  • Test failure: profiler/assembly/ALCTest/ALCTest.sh #105212
    9.0.0
  • Call to extension yield method is ignored if the returned values are discarded. #98489
  • Assertion failed in test Interop\\ICustomMarshaler\\ConflictingNames\\MultipleALCs\\MultipleALCs.cmd: refCollectionObject != NULL #47696
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Change `System.String..ctor(System.SByte*)` et all to use UTF-8 on Windows #92919
    Future
  • Possible DEREF_AFTER_NULL.EX at src/coreclr/vm/eepolicy.cpp #100212
    9.0.0
  • LINQ - use TryGetSpan in Enumerable.Count with predicate #102696
    Future
  • Possible DEREF_AFTER_NULL.EX at src/coreclr/vm/eepolicy.cpp #100210
    9.0.0
  • System.Resources.Extensions.Tests.FormattedObject.BasicObjectTests.BasicObjectsRoundTripAndMatch failure #104905
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests #98669
  • StackOverflowException on System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests #99963
  • Regressions in System.Perf_Convert #94477
  • Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringSegmentBenchmark #94301
  • .NET 8, missing StartsWithAny and EndsWithAny methods in MemoryExtensions #94155
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8ParserTests #91623
  • C# try catch is not working, application crashes after exception #96235
  • Documentation and capabilities for filtering tests to run are inadequate #99384
    Future
  • Compiler error CS1510 is triggered on compiler-generated variables #105252
  • Blazor webassembly does not hit breakpoints on <select> bindings #104231
    9.0.0
  • Add display name filtering in merged tests #93452
  • Inconsistent handling of duplicate keys in INI configuration files #99535
    Future
  • Test Crash: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UnitTests.AsyncTests.Imported_AsyncWithEH #99623
  • [API Proposal]: In TarEntry objects emitted by TarReader, make the offset to the entry data in enclosing stream a public property #101314
    9.0.0
  • `LibraryImportGenerator` fails when `LibraryImportAttribute` is aliased #105137
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.StartInfo_NotepadWithContent_withArgumentList(useShellExecute: True) #68246
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 3/13/2024 1:55:40 AM #99968
    9.0.0
  • Tracking issue for "WORKLOAD TIMED OUT" #90309
  • Suppurt C++\CLI in Linux with installed Net.Core Runtime? #105230
  • Path for ICU_DAT_FILE_PATH when targeting iOS inside an XCTest bundle #88835
    9.0.0
  • [browser][publish] Unicode in the path are not parsed correctly in Windows for AOT/relink by emcc #83497
    9.0.0
  • Possible unobserved IOException in HttpClient using SocketsHttpHandler #105154
  • Ensure no component embed the Index/Range source code and reference Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package instead #104308
    9.0.0
  • ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty failed in CI #103448
    9.0.0
  • Collapse official build legs into one per configuration #76911
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09/b15155/b15155/b15155.dll #105217

PullRequests

Created

  • Update assert to handle `object[]` element type #105287
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Rename corefx -> runtime libraries #105285
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Globalization.Extensions.Tests for icu 74/unicode 15.1 #105282
    area-System.Globalization, test-bug, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [test][Eventpipe] Disable eventsourceerror on OSX #105278
    needs-area-label
  • Report a diagnostic when a type inherits from a GeneratedComClass-attributed type and does not have the GeneratedComClass attribute #105277
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Debugger should not manage exceptions during shutdown #105270
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Mark the new tensor APIs as experimental for .NET 9 #105268
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Base 64 decoder, reject input when unused bits are not 0 #105262
    area-System.Memory
  • Resolving an antigen failure #105260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Slightly improve MinOpts JIT TP #105250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build .NETCoreApp source gens in allconfigurations build #105247
    needs-area-label
  • Fix intellisense package xml file failing up-to-date check in libs projects #105243
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete dead code in System.Diagnostics.Tracing tests #105237
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Turn `BlazorCacheBootResources` off by default when targeting .NET 9 #105235
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add binding against configuration section #105228
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

Merged

  • Take process lock earlier #105280
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable generic function pointer tests on mono #103534
    area-Interop-mono, community-contribution
  • Improve the handling of SVE state as part of threadsuspend #105059
    area-PAL-coreclr, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions #104399
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Update assert and enable tests for CoreCLR #105266
    area-System.Reflection, 9.0.0
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Revert "Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions" #105284
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • `Guid(Int32, Int16, Int16, Byte[])` changes #105208
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser][MT] longer timeout for VFS heavy tests #105258
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix Deadlock Inside Metrics Code #105259
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [mono] Exit early to prevent endless loop when crashing #105249
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add support for AES-GCM and ChaCha20Poly1305 on iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst via CryptoKit #104383
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • remove corefx from md #105275
    area-Meta
  • Revert "Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. (#104336)" #105234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add JsonEnumMemberNameAttribute. #105032
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Replace `Debug.Assert(false,` with `Debug.Fail(` #105205
    area-Meta
  • Disable flaky FSW test #105254
    area-System.IO, os-windows, 9.0.0
  • Reenable GC stress testing for MultipleALCs test #105231
    GCStress, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] avoid OOM in RentingGiganticArraySucceedsOrOOMs #105246
    arch-wasm, area-System.Memory, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add fast path for linq count with predicate #102884
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Augment System.Linq sink tests to validate more collection types #105253
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • store the WeakReference targets in static fields, so they are never freed by the GC during test run #105072
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] add missing core assemblies #105244
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove dead code for NetFx ASP.NET #105115
    area-System.Configuration
  • Fix `NamespaceCache` usage in `System.Private.Xml.Linq` #101158
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix condition in Debug.Assert in TarEntry.cs #100860
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Fix KeyAvailable and ReadKey() in ConsolePal.Windows. #104984
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • handle Unicode encoding in Console.Beep #105094
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • Add support for filtering merged tests by display name #105238
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose the TarEntry start of the data stream #105007
    new-api-needs-documentation, partner-impact, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Fix Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 docs #104505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Call gtFoldExpr in morph for tier0 #105190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update feature switch doc for WinForms feature switches #104673
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Disable failing schema test on mono runtimes. #105233
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Update sln files with slngen #105239
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][publish] Unicode in the path are parsed correctly in Windows for AOT/relink by emcc #105144
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix doc comments #99331
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary `IDE0060` suppressions #105036
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty - Get spawned thread by ID from Process.Threads to avoid mismatch #104972
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Delete dead Interop.Gdi32.* code #105209
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Have lowering set up IR for post-indexed addressing and make strength reduced IV updates amenable to post-indexed addressing #105185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WASM] Update features doc #105068
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser

Updated

  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Build Mono build tasks packs only when targeting mobile #105153
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview7]Update downlevel to 8.0.8 #105114
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2500218 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add InheritServiceKeyAttribute to enable resolving the dependencies with the same key #102160
    NO-MERGE, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Make `ObjectFactory<T>` covariant #102553
    NO-MERGE, blocked, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Remove unused members on runtime Thread #105158
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][aot] Emit marhsalling exception when dealing with MONO_MARSHAL_CONV_OBJECT_IUNKNOWN #105156
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Respect general-purpose bit flags when decoding ZipArchiveEntry names and comments #103271
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • fix broken Select with error list on macOS #104915
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Some more automated C# modernization in corelib #105151
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [release/8.0-staging] For transition profiler callbacks, always load the thread #105200
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Extension agnostic lazy assembly loading #104793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Don't enable validation when UseDefaultServiceProvider is called #105170
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Ensure `ISimdVector` default implementations throw documented exceptions #104831
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Revert "Use generic math for floating point formatting" for Single and Double #105038
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • fix dn_vector_custom_resize #102591
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • WIP: experimental LoadLibrary monitoring in CoreCLR native runtime #93258
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • Update to 22.04 queues #88619
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #105027
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser

  • JIT: Change VN's representation for phi definitions #105198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

  • JIT: Enable inversion of top-tested loops #105161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update or remove the version of Microsoft.IO.Redist in 8.0.1xx, 8.0.3xx, and 8.0.4xx #42279
  • [NETSDKE2E][Intermittent]error MSB4242: SDK Resolver Failure: "The SDK resolver "Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver" failed while attempting to resolve the SDK "Microsoft.NET.SDK.WorkloadAutoIm..." displays when running command quickly in CLI #42269
  • Mac 14.1 mounts the smb directory, and the same program is executed twice to open the file, and the file is occupied by other programs #42268

Closed

  • APICompat fails when Roslyn's dependencies move past our own. #32691
    8.0.4xx
  • zsh: command not found: dotnet on Mac m1 #22910
  • List non-project references from CLI #9527
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for IsEnhancedModelMetadataSupported feature switch #42283
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • RC Branding #42281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the version of System.Formats.Asn1 #42278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the version of System.Formats.Asn1 #42277
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reenable TemplateEngine tests #42267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow charset to be `unset` #42266
    untriaged, Area-Format

Merged

  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #42270
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard Installer core-sdk-tasks tests to Helix #42243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mark Verify files as lf and utf8 according to the recommended settings #41992
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add support to generate publish WebJob Run command file compatible wi… #42242
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add Android workload manifests to SB .NET SDK #42125
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Add source.dot.net stage 1 asset publication #42132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Spike #42240
  • Support AdditionalMSBuildParameters #42251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio insists on autocorrecting the method name I type to a similarly named field #74482
  • Renaming a global using alias does not update usages #74474
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cannot create nuint to UInt32 conversion in custom CoreLib #66442
  • When does AttributeData.AttributeClass return null? #65355
  • Tests failing with BadImageFormatException #74396
  • Erroneous CS0266 on 'byte = byte & byte' #74375
  • Ref escape analysis errors are not reported for compound assignment #63852
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions in public APIs #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update SystemTextJsonVersion to 8.0.4 #74489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adds support for metadata LSP language features in VSCode #74488
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't check constraints on methods which are not substituted #74487
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include PrepareResources before ExtensionJsonOutputGroup #74486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not parse methods with accessibility modifiers as local functions #74484
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove C++ sources from repo #74481
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Sem search signature #74480
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move to new version of MS.DevDiv.Optimization.Data.Powershell #74483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • 17.10 : Also checking line end when block structure is filtered #74477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • 17.11 : Also checking line end when block structure is filtered #74479
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify access to options across code style, code style fixes and feature layers #74450
    Next
  • Add additional incremental generator test #74476
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Editor color scheme is visible but disabled when unsupported theme is selected #74236
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove Overload Resolution Priority from working set #74382
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Tests to verify ref safety bug fix #74341

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish minified .js files as a package, remove related components from Shared Framework #56934
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Check minified .js files back in #56933
    9.0-rc1
  • Customizing deserialization of JS interop in blazor (again) #56926
    Backlog

Closed

  • Blazor JS to .Net Streaming. IJSStreamReference using same stream reference. #56912
  • Add new `ModelMetadata` constructor for EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider #56867
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56922
  • Perf regression: https #56924
  • Mapping Exception x StatusCode in ExceptionHandlerMiddleware #44156
    9.0-preview7
  • ASP.NET Core default authentication handler doesn't make any sense with AllowAnonymous #56925
  • Need custom configurations and New Default implementations for Identity Endpoints #56914
  • .NET 8 Blazor "No authenticationScheme was specified, and there was no DefaultChallengeScheme found" on Authorize Attribute after updating from .NET6 #56820
  • Push minified .js files to submodule #56472
    9.0-preview7
  • `ElementReference` is sometimes null when performing interop in `OnAfterRenderAsync` #56892
  • [Blazor] Improve BuildRenderTree performance by allowing the app developer to state unequivocally that specific state has not changed #26016
    Backlog
  • [6.0] Bad template configuration #56904
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56918
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56923
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException #56839
  • Improve Kestrel metrics #53358
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine `RazorPages_CanBeServedAndUpdatedViaRuntimeCompilation` #56935
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Look up trusted certs consistently on windows #56701
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-preview7
  • Move guardian suppressions to code instead of .gdnsuppress #56911
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #56766
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview7
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24371.4 #56927
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview7
  • Increase quarantine pr timeout #56871
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Only enable auto-merge in main #56932
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview7
  • Update gRPC, Protobuf package versions #56909
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview7
  • Use minified .js files from submodule in source-build #56864
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview7
  • Avoid StringSegment conversions #56533
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Make ApiExplorer for minimal APIs trim-compatible #56827
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • using one style approach for all 3 configs WebAssembly, Web and Server #56758
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Replace "instanceof" due to DOM realm mixin when Blazor is IFRAME-d #56367
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected semantics if .All() predicate evaluates to NULL for some rows? #34271
  • Cosmos: Switch the default discriminator property to $type #34269
    9.0.0
  • LINQ creation fails when using join and user defined function #34266
  • Still this issue not being fixed until now #34265

Closed

  • Promote ExecuteUpdate/Delete from relational to core #31052
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Data corruption due to missing subquery pushdowns (block such scenarios) #34123
    9.0.0
  • First DbContext query call is noticeably slower than subsequent calls. #33268
  • Cosmos: error when attempting to save entity with CLR default key value #34180
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Better reporting for query cache hits and misses for OTEL. #34267

Merged

  • Move ExecuteUpdate/ExecuteDelete to core so non-relational providers can implement #34257
  • Cosmos: error on operator ordering that requires pushdown #34255
  • Generate suppressible error when entity saved to Cosmos without PK value set #34250

Updated

  • Transform aggregate functions over subqueries on SQL Server #34262
  • LEAST/GREATEST nullability work #32458
  • Get partition keys, container name, and JsonIdDefinition from the root entity in the hierarchy by default #34252
